title: ONLY essential govt staff must report for duty from Thursday (26)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration had informed all the Heads of Government Departments to prepare and implement an appropriate arrangement to call only the officers who are essential to delivering public services for duty with effect from Thursday (26).
The letter from Secretary P. K. Mayadunne also refers to action necessary to save electricity and fuel for the management of government expenses.
However, these measures should not be an obstacle to the maintenance of essential services of the government.
